title: Chapter III carve-out — product safety pathway (Art. 2(2))

question.prompt: Is the AI system classified as high-risk solely via Article 6(1) and related to products covered by Annex I Section B, such that only Article 6(1), Articles 102–109 and Article 112 apply?
question.help: This carve-out limits which provisions apply for systems classified only under Art. 6(1) via product law.

items.label: Scope of carve-out
items.text: For high-risk AI systems under Art. 6(1) related to products covered by Annex I Section B, only Art. 6(1), Arts. 102–109 and Art. 112 apply (Art. 57 may apply where requirements are integrated).
